column4: perhaps your settings werent saved to the config file correctly? So when it came to reading the net conf file, it resorted to defaults?

I am talking very philosophically - about how science, computer science, everything fusking sucks. You can't have servers that lose their network setup. it should the first thing on the fusking feature list
im guessing you are not a programmer?
perhaps #ubuntu-offtopic is more approriate for this subject?
